meanings.definition: Not admitted to a hospital for treatment.
meanings.sent1: The nonhospitalized patient received care at home.
meanings.sent2: She was nonhospitalized and recovering well.
meanings.sent3: The nonhospitalized teddy bear got better with rest.
meanings.sent4: Her nonhospitalized status was a relief to her family.
meanings.sent5: The nonhospitalized child played happily in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed that he was nonhospitalized.
meanings.sent2: The nonhospitalized injury healed on its own.
meanings.sent3: The nonhospitalized cat preferred to stay outdoors.
meanings.sent4: Her nonhospitalized condition was a blessing in disguise.
meanings.sent5: The nonhospitalized plant thrived in the sunlight.
